item.title: Arturia Microfreak Samples
item.description: Here’s a repository for some of the curious sounds I’m getting out of the Microfreak. Enjoy :) MF

item.title: Modular Construction Kit
item.description: I recently added a library of simple(ish) waveforms from a Eurorack modular. Each wave has been recorded with different filter settings allowing for crossfade modulation and other fancy tricks. Patch files are available in EXS, NKI and SFZ formats. Modular Construction Kit
